Service Details: - Provides fire and rescue services within its boundaries as well as a portion of the City of Kelowna under contract- A mutual aid partner in the Regional District of Central Okanagan, including auto extrication, marine rescue and rope rescue- Consists of three fire halls:  Station 71, Winfield; Station 81, Carr’s Landing; and Station 91, Oyama
